channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for FL

item.title: Report X-2023110470
item.description:
Report X-2023110470

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-29T18:13:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-20
  • City: SAINT PETERSBURG
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was notified of undeclared hazardous package leaking and responded but suiting up and placing package into hazardous bin. DescribePack: Broken cap was found on bottles of acetic acid. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in red lined hazardous materials bin to slow spread of leakage.

item.title: Report X-2023110464
item.description:
Report X-2023110464

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-29T18:13:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-10
  • City: PUNTA GORDA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Around 530 a.m. 2023-10-10 a package handler stated that he had a damage hazmat box that was leaking. He placed it on the floor till the manager came and retrieved it. DescribePack: Upon opening the box, it was discovered that the caps of three of the bottles are loose. The leakage was very minimal, only about 4 oz in total. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed up-right, and the caps were tightened.

item.title: Report X-2023110167
item.description:
Report X-2023110167

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-29T18:13:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-23
  • City: DEFUNIAK SPRINGS
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg. was received wet and compromised. Pkg. taken to QA for further inspection. DescribePack: Upon inspecting the contents, it was noted that both of the 1 gallon plastic containers had loose caps, causing about 2 oz. of liquid to leak from each. There were no materials inside to protect the containers. Orientation arrows were present on the box. DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. was placed inside a bin, awaiting instructions from PGH.

item.title: Report X-2023110127
item.description:
Report X-2023110127

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-29T18:13:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-25
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: 1 plastic pail of Aqua-Org Plus was found spilling dirt. Upon inspection part of bottom of pail was broken allowing to spill solid content. Pail display Oxidizer diamond but no OP-900 or certificate found. Package was shipped as normal package & not as hazmat. DescribePack: Pail had broken bottom allowing to spill solid content. Pail display Oxidizer diamond but no OP-900 or certificate found. Package was shipped as normal package & not as hazmat. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report E-2023110020
item.description:
Report E-2023110020

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-28T18:13:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-05
  • City: HIALEAH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported the spill consisted of (1) 55 gallon metal drum of Lacolene (UN1268), which was delivered to the NMF terminal from another terminal missing approximately 20 gallons due to a puncture at the bottom, and was repalletized and sent over. The terminal attempted to move this drum and 2 others to the consignee, but all three were refused. The terminal stated they placed the one damaged drum into a 65 gallon poly drum, and the other two that were undamaged were shrink wrapped and placed on a pallet. Waste was left for terminal to manage.

The pail is defective/broken due to leaking out of a small hole located in the center of bottom of pail. DescribePack: Plastic pail was defective/broken due to leaking out of a small hole located in the center of bottom of pail. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

DescribePack: One of the jerricans in the box was leaking contents from under the cap, even though the cap was on tight. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed upright into a hazbag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023110058
item.description:
Report X-2023110058

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-20
  • City: POMPANO BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box arrived in Damages Area leaking on the bottom. An admin put the box in a red tote and HazMat bag. She then took it to the HazMat Cage for processing. DescribePack: The box was soaked on the bottom. The cap was broken off within the box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: A red tote and a HazMat bag were used to transport the package to the HazMat Cage for processing.

item.title: Report X-2023110053
item.description:
Report X-2023110053

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-19
  • City: DEFUNIAK SPRINGS
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg. was received damaged. Pkg. had liquid leaking from bottom of box, taken to QA for inspection. DescribePack: Upon inspecting pkg., it was noted that there were 2, 1 gallon containers of Corrosive material, pkg. was not declared a Hazmat by shipper. There were no labels, orientation arrows, hazmat shipping paper work of any type. We noticed it was a Hazmat by looking at the container, has Corrosive label on it. Cans were stacked on top of each other in box, just brown paper to protect contents. We searched to see if shipper was an Authorized Shipper, they are not. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. sitting in bin in HMPA awaiting instructions from PGH. Will reach out to customer to see if they are willing to pick up the undamaged container.

item.title: Report X-2023101424
item.description:
Report X-2023101424

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-19
  • City: POMPANO BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box was found leaking during the sort. It was moved to the HazMat cage with a red tote and HazMat bag. DescribePack: One cap was loose and leaked out. Bottom of the box was wet and one top corner was torn out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: An admin had moved it into the HazMat Cage using a red tote along with a HazMat bag.
